short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Offline first, end-to-end encrypted note taking

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PrivaNote is an offline first, end-to-end encrypted note taking application.

Accessible at https://privanote.xyz, this extension overrides your new tab page to show PrivaNote.

Now jotting down notes in a secure and privacy friendly away is as simple as CMD (or CTRL) + T.
